title: A Painfully Slow Recovery for America�s Workers: Causes, Implications, and the Federal Reserve�s Response
content: For release on delivery  1:00 p.m. EST   February 11, 2013                          A Painfully Slow Recovery for America’s Workers:   Causes, Implications, and the Federal Reserve’s Response    Remarks by     Janet L. Yellen     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “A Trans-Atlantic Agenda for Shared Prosperity”      A Conference Sponsored by the AFL-CIO, Friedrich Ebert Stiftung,   and the IMK Macroeconomic Policy Institute     Washington, D.C.    February 11, 2013
